input.sentences: my day was all about signs . i found this one on highway 44 . it said facts about location .
this one i found on highway 23 . it also had cool facts about location .
this one i found twenty feet down the road from the last one and it was in a language i could n't understand .
in the middle of location i found this sign that was all about location .
then i decided to just take a picture of the street . turns out the only signs in location are about the state of location !
output.sentences: There are signs in various locations along the highway marking historic sites.
In this location on the highway, he found a sign about Parson's Cavalry.
He started to understand there were twenty sites on this road.
This sign was found in the middle of the wall. The location was prominent.
Along the street, there are many signs and pictures to enjoy.
